projects.name: Comparative
projects.description: Comparative gathers a crowd source opinion on anything that can be captured in a photo. This project was part of a 7 day sprint. Where I developed user stories, modeled databases and implemented Rails technology stack on Heroku.

projects.name: AppSpark
projects.description: A Kick Starter-esc app, to help find developers collaborate on projects. Users can post projects, request developers, enter scope of work, and more. This project was a 7 day sprint and uses join tables to map relationships, many assorted gems, AWS storage and utilized the github API to enhance user app and user profiles.

projects.name: Simon
projects.description: This project was a 7 day sprint and was designed to test my understanding of functional programming. During this project I utilizes multiple resources such as Classmates, Stack Overflow and Github. I was able to build this game completely with just functional programming.

projects.name: League of Legends dashboard
projects.description: A React client with a node backend that utilized Chartjs to create stunning visualization of data from the League of Legends API
